author: Staff Reporter
text:
A final year Civil Engineering girl student of a private engineering college under Nalattinputhur police limits allegedly committed suicide by hanging herself in the hostel room on Thursday night.

According to police, S. Priyanka (21) of Koviloothu in Tirunelveli was found hanging by a rope in her room at the hostel located at K.R. Nagar. The incident occurred when the girl was alone in the room and others had gone for supper. It was reported at 11 p.m. However, reason behind the incident is yet to be ascertained. The body was taken to the Government Hospital, Kovilpatti for post mortem.

Based on a complaint lodged by L. Mary (27), warden of the women’s hostel, a case has been filed by Nalattinputhur police. Investigations are on.
title: Engineering student commits suicide in hostel
